Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES

Title: Enacts the "shelter arrears eviction forestallment act"
Summary: Enacts the "shelter arrears eviction forestallment act" to provide emergency assistance for rent or mortgage arrears or other fees for the prevention of eviction.
LawCode: Add ยง131-cc, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to enacting the "shelter arrears eviction forestallment act" to provide emergency assistance for rent or mortgage arrears or other fees for the prevention of eviction
